price: چى د ده له خوا درجې، بخښنه او لورينه ده، او الله مهربان بخښونكى دى.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
